data.title: Bad Menudo...
data.text:
I had there Menudo plate yesterday morning... it was not the best I've had, yet it was not too bad either. 

If i can give a suggestion to them, it would be: Not to make their Menudo to greasy and if possible, to serve it on a regular hard plate and not there foam cheap plates.

Even though the portions served we're good, the temperature of the food was not, it should always be served hot, when it is not, you can see and taste the grease of the Menudo... and that's not good at all.

The tortillas were half hot and cold as well. Overall it was not what I expected from this place which was recommended to me earlier.

data.title: Outstanding Takeout Mexican Food, Hiding under the Main St. Bridge
data.text:
There are many places to get Mexican food in the Hesperia area, but none of them can hold a candle to the CASA DELICIAS, located on Hesperia Road under the Main St Bridge. They have a few card tables and folding chairs if you do want to eat in, but you are much better off getting your food to go and taking it home, eating in your car, or drive a few blocks south to Lime St. Park and have a picnic. The IN-House dining area is small, and fills with folks waiting for their orders at meal times. Call your order in ahead to save time when you pick it up.
Many super good choices on the menu ! One of the best are the Pork Carnitas, large cubes of roasted pork usually 2 inches to a side look like building blocks--you apply the sauce after you get them wherever you're going.. The Beef and cheese Burrito is another winner. You can buy Tamales buy the dozen. We really like the Pork filled ones.
The restaurant is located across the street from the BNSF Mainline RR to L A. Often train crews will halt their train at the signal light here and run across to pick up an order they called in from up the road earlier.

data.title: Delicious Little Dive
data.text: The people are nice and the food is excellent!  I love the tamale plate.  The also sell tortillas and have a little deli inside.

data.title: Fast
data.text: This place is tasty has a good selection on their menu. Pretty fresh food . However, since the place is small there is ver limited seating and given that its in a questionable area . The quality of customers vary from day to day . Very affordable.

data.title: Family owned great home cookin
data.text: My family and I love this restaurant. If you are in the mood for some home cooked mexican food you have got to go here. Its family owned,and evey time we go there they make us feel very special with there great service.
